title: Vegetable Crop Rotation on Small Farms with Jordan Scheibel and Hannah Breckbill

subtasks: Discussing land leasing and production practices
Explaining annual crop sales and marketing channels
Describing farm rotations and land division
Detailing high tunnel crop rotation and management
Discussing cover crop and soil management strategies
Presenting ongoing farm adaptation and evolution
Outlining future plans for expanding crop diversification

tasks.task: Overall, there are numerous agricultural tasks relating to land use, rotations, crop management, irrigation, cover crops, no-till practices, and marketing. This transcript is highly relevant to the requested tasks. So, compiling those into MAINTASK and creating subtasks. Each line should be a distinct task.
